content: Advance cautiously to spy a Poisestone and two Bladebones on some scaffolding awaiting your arrival. Use Cloudstep to ambush the weaker enemies first, then slam into the Poisestone with a charged hit to put it down.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Squall Hideout' and the sub-subsection 'The Fourth Buddha’s Eyeball'.
The content is as follows:
Advance cautiously to spy a Poisestone and two Bladebones on some scaffolding awaiting your arrival. Use Cloudstep to ambush the weaker enemies first, then slam into the Poisestone with a charged hit to put it down.
